comments.text: We did not notice that one of the CSP demos broke recently because the browser had cached some resources that caused the broken demo to function correctly. We should ensure that we are getting accurate results. E.g. make all resources in the demo uncacheable using Cache-Control headers, or add a note to the main CSP demo site that instructs the user to clear the cache and refresh.
comments.creator: brian@briansmith.org

comments.text:
This should be fixed.  I put:

Header unset ETag
Header set Cache-Control "max-age=0, no-cache, no-store, must-revalidate"
Header set Pragma "no-cache"
Header set Expires "Tue, 01 Jan 1980 06:00:00 GMT"

in the .htaccess for all of the tests and subresources.  Brian, since you filed this bug do you want to test the demo and close the bug if it seems right to you?

http://people.mozilla.org/~bsterne/content-security-policy/demo.cgi
